name: Plenty of Fish (Peanut Free Games)
description:
Take control of a school as you try to increase its size by finding food and avoiding danger. Launch you fish like torpidos to defend their friends against predators.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. 

I was not able to implement the full game loop but there is enough in this prototype to experience the gameplay and fight a couple of piranhas.

Thank you for playing <3

Controls:
Controller:
-Left Stick: Move
-Right Stick: Aim
-Right Trigger: Shoot
Keyboard & Mouse:
-WASD: Move
-Mouse: Aim
-Left Button: Shoot
